app.name: Fleet Navigator
app.tagline: Your private AI - free, local and without cloud

welcome.title: Welcome to Fleet Navigator
welcome.subtitle: Start a conversation with your AI fleet

letter.title: Write letter
letter.prompt: Help me write a cover letter for a position as [Your Position]

question.title: Ask questions
question.description: About any topic - science, history, everyday life
question.prompt: Explain to me how photosynthesis works

translate.title: Translate
translate.prompt: Translate the following text into German: [Your text here]

learn.title: Learn
learn.prompt: Explain step by step: What is artificial intelligence?

code.title: Programming
code.prompt: Write me a Python script that [describe your task]

creative.title: Be creative
creative.prompt: Write me a poem about autumn

sidebar.noChatsDesc: Create your first chat or start a new project
sidebar.noProjectDesc: Don't assign chat to any project
sidebar.logoutConfirm: Do you really want to logout?

download.title: Document ready
download.description: The generated document is ready for download

topbar.versionMismatch: Version Mismatch! Press Ctrl+Shift+R to reload
topbar.customModelPrompt: Custom model uses its own system prompt (not changeable)
topbar.matesOnline: {count} of {total} Mates online - Click for dashboard
topbar.noMatesPaired: No Mates paired - Click for dashboard

chat.title: Chat
chat.placeholderWithImage: Describe the image or ask a question...

chat.loadModel: Please load a model in the Model Manager first
chat.clearHistoryConfirm: Do you really want to clear the chat history?

general.title: General Settings

general.themeLawyerDesc: Light design with Navy Blue & Gold
general.showModeSwitchMessagesDesc: Shows notifications when an expert automatically changes perspective

mates.title: Fleet Mates Pairing
mates.subtitle: Fleet Mates are agents running on other systems that communicate with the Navigator.
mates.forgetAllDesc: Removes all paired devices. They will need to be paired again.
mates.connectViaSystem: Mates can connect via the pairing system
mates.modelAssignmentDesc: Assign each Fleet Mate a specific model. Small, fast models (1B-7B) are recommended.

models.title: Smart Model Selection
models.subtitle: Automatic routing to specialized models
models.enabledDesc: Automatically selects the best model for the task
models.codeModelDesc: For code generation, debugging, technical questions
models.emailModelDesc: For email classification and response generation
models.documentModelDesc: For letter generation and formal texts

voice.title: Speech Input & Output
voice.subtitle: Configure speech recognition and text-to-speech
voice.ttsEnabledDesc: Enable reading responses aloud via speaker button
voice.whisperInstallHint: You need to download the Whisper program first before you can use speech recognition.
voice.whisperDownloadInfo: Extracts whisper.cpp (~2.5 MB) + downloads the speech model (~150 MB)
voice.selectModelHint: Select a model - larger models are more accurate but slower:
voice.piperInstallHint: You need to download the Piper program first before you can use voices.
voice.piperDownloadInfo: Installs the Piper program + the German voice "Thorsten"
voice.clickToTest: Click on an installed voice to test it.

hardware.title: Hardware & Performance
hardware.subtitle: GPU acceleration and hardware usage
hardware.cpuOnlyDesc: Disables GPU acceleration for demos without NVIDIA
hardware.cpuOnlyActive: CPU mode active - responses are slower

prompts.title: System Prompts
prompts.subtitle: Create and manage reusable system prompts
prompts.managementDesc: Create and manage reusable system prompts for your chats
prompts.createFirstHint: Create your first system prompt with the button above
prompts.name: Name
prompts.promptPlaceholder: You are a helpful assistant that...
prompts.setAsDefaultHint: This prompt will be automatically used for new chats

customModels.title: Custom Model
customModels.subtitle: System prompts and sampling parameters for custom models
customModels.samplingDesc: Fine-tune text generation - These parameters affect how creative or deterministic the model responds

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.subtitle: Your data stays local
privacy.localOnly: All data is stored locally only

danger.title: DANGER ZONE
danger.warningPermanent: These actions are permanent and cannot be undone!
danger.projectsDesc: All projects, uploaded files and context files
danger.settingsConfigDesc: All app settings and model configurations
danger.templatesDesc: System prompts, letter templates and presets
danger.noteAppReload: The application will automatically reload after deletion. Ideal for testing and demo purposes.
danger.deleteSelectedTitle: Permanently delete selected data and reinitialize with default data
danger.selectCategoryFirst: Please select at least one category

agents.autoVisionModelDesc: Automatically select Vision Model on image upload
agents.noVisionModels: No vision models found. Download vision models from the Model Store.
agents.visionChainingDesc: Vision Model Output â†’ Main Model
agents.osMateDesc: Configure folders for local document search. The index searches PDF, DOCX and ODT files.

webSearch.title: Web Search (RAG)
webSearch.braveApiDescription: 2000 free searches/month â€¢ Reliable â€¢ No rate limits

confirm.unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes. Do you really want to leave?

modelManager.title: Model Manager
modelManager.createFirstCustom: Create your first custom model with your own system prompt
modelManager.clickNewExpert: Click "New Expert" to create your first AI expert.
modelManager.downloadDuration: Download may take 5-30 minutes (depending on model size)
modelManager.doNotCancel: Do not cancel! An incomplete download makes the model unusable
modelManager.checkSize: Note model size: Large models (> 10 GB) take longer
modelManager.downloadInterruptWarning: The download must not be interrupted. If you cancel, the incomplete model will be automatically deleted.
modelManager.estimatedDuration: Estimated duration: 5-30 minutes (depending on model size)

modelStore.title: Model Store
modelStore.subtitle: Choose and download GGUF models directly from HuggingFace
modelStore.downloadInProgress: A download is already running. Please wait until it's finished.
modelStore.downloadAnyway: Do you want to download the model ANYWAY?
modelStore.cpuModeWarning: (It will only work in CPU mode or not at all)
modelStore.continueAnyway: Do you want to continue anyway?
modelStore.modelSelected: Model "{name}" selected and llama.cpp provider activated!

expertManager.title: Expert System
expertManager.subtitle: Create and manage AI experts with different perspectives
expertManager.noExpertsDesc: Create your first AI expert with different perspectives for specialized advice.
expertManager.deleteConfirmDesc: The expert and all its perspectives will be deleted.

language.title: Sprache / Language / Dil
language.subtitle: Choose the language for Fleet Navigator

welcome.title: Welcome to Fleet Navigator!
welcome.subtitle: Your AI-powered expert system for small offices.
welcome.setupInfo: This wizard will help you set up Fleet Navigator. It only takes a few minutes.

system.title: System Check
system.subtitle: We're analyzing your hardware to recommend the best AI model.
system.withGpuInfo: Great! With a GPU, the AI runs especially fast.
system.withoutGpuInfo: Perfect! The AI runs efficiently on your CPU.

model.title: Choose AI Model
model.subtitle: Choose a model based on your hardware:
model.ramWarning: With only {ram} GB RAM, Fleet Navigator cannot run. At least 8 GB RAM is required.

cpuInfo.title: What to expect (without GPU)
cpuInfo.hint: Times vary depending on CPU performance. You can switch anytime!

gpuInfo.title: With {gpu} ({vram} GB VRAM)
gpuInfo.hint: t/s = Tokens per second. Only select available models!

vision.title: Document Recognition (Optional)
vision.subtitle: Vision models enable "seeing" and analyzing documents and images.

infoList.sender: Automatically detect sender and document type

vision.noResourcesWarning: Not enough resources for Vision models. You can use Tesseract OCR as a lightweight alternative.

tesseractFallback.title: Tesseract OCR (Fallback)
tesseractFallback.description: Classic text recognition (OCR). Extracts text from documents, but no image analysis or context understanding. Perfect for weak hardware.

skipOption.title: Set up later
skipOption.description: Skip document recognition. You can download Vision models later in the Model Manager.

voice.title: Voice Features (Optional)
voice.subtitle: Speech recognition and text-to-speech for Fleet Navigator.
voice.skipInfo: Voice features are optional. You can enable them later in the settings.

whisper.title: Speech Recognition (Whisper)
whisper.description: Converts spoken language to text. Choose a model based on your hardware.
whisper.notAvailable: Whisper is not yet available on this platform.

piper.title: Text-to-Speech (Piper)
piper.description: Reads AI responses aloud. Choose a voice.
piper.notAvailable: Piper is not yet available on this platform.

nextSteps.title: Next Steps
nextSteps.downloadModel: Download an AI model in the Model Manager
nextSteps.startChat: Start a chat with the Navigator
nextSteps.createExperts: Create your own experts for special tasks
nextSteps.connectMates: Connect Fleet Mates (browser extension, Thunderbird, etc.)

createExpertModal.name: Name
createExpertModal.testVoiceHint: Double-click or â–¶ to test the voice
createExpertModal.communicationStylePlaceholder: e.g. Use informal address, be friendly...
createExpertModal.showSourceLinksHint: Off = Response without source citations (clean text)
createExpertModal.uploadDocsHint: Documents can be uploaded in the Settings section.
createExpertModal.migratePostgres: Migrate to PostgreSQL in Settings â†’ PostgreSQL Migration to enable Vector RAG.
createExpertModal.antiHallucinationDesc: Rules to prevent fabrications and false sources
createExpertModal.antiHallucinationPlaceholder:
Leave empty = use default rules

Example:
## NO HALLUCINATIONS
- NEVER invent information...
createExpertModal.antiHallucinationHint: Empty = default rules are used. Custom prompt completely overrides the default rules.

modelDownloadModal.title: Downloading Model
modelDownloadModal.patienceMessage: The download may take several minutes depending on model size and internet connection. Please don't close this window or start another download.
modelDownloadModal.confirmCancelMessage: Do you really want to cancel the download? Progress will be lost.

matePairing.title: New Pairing Request
matePairing.subtitle: A Fleet Mate wants to connect
matePairing.compareCode: Compare this code with the one on your Mate
matePairing.securityWarning: Only accept requests from devices you recognize. After pairing, this Mate can communicate encrypted with the Navigator.

documentAgent.title: Letter Agent
documentAgent.subtitle: AI-powered letter creation
documentAgent.generatingDocument: The AI is creating your document...
documentAgent.tipContent: The more detailed your prompt, the better the result!
documentAgent.waitInfo: With less computing power, this may take 30-60 seconds. Please be patient...
documentAgent.tryDifferentSearch: Try a different search or category
documentAgent.whatToCreate: What would you like to create?
documentAgent.promptPlaceholder: Example: Create a cancellation letter for my home insurance due to the fact that they increased the annual premium.
documentAgent.promptHint: Describe exactly what document you want to create. The more detailed, the better the result.
documentAgent.modelConfiguredInSettings: The model for document creation is configured in the settings. The agent selects it automatically.
documentAgent.pleaseWait: Please wait, this may take a moment...
documentAgent.documentCreated: LibreOffice was opened. You can now edit the document.
documentAgent.saveTemplateSubtitle: Save this prompt as a reusable template

systemHealth.openModelManager: Open the Model Manager in Settings and download GGUF models from the Model Store.
systemHealth.qwenDesc: Excellent German, small and fast (2.1 GB)

fleetMate.noMatesDescription: Fleet Mates collect hardware data from remote systems

mateTerminal.whitelistHint: Only whitelisted commands allowed (df, free, ps, systemctl, etc.)

step1.title: Choose a Base Model
step1.subtitle: The language model determines the intelligence and capabilities of your expert.

step2.subtitle: Extend your expert with additional capabilities.
step2.webSearchDesc: Automatic internet research for current information
step2.fileSearchDesc: Search in uploaded documents and files
step2.vectorDbDesc: RAG from your own knowledge index for precise answers

step3.title: Configure Parameters
step3.subtitle: Fine-tuning for optimal responses.
step3.contextSizeDesc: How much text the expert can "keep in mind"

step4.title: Define Personality
step4.subtitle: Give your expert an identity.
step4.name: Name
step4.basePromptPlaceholder: You are [Name], an experienced [Role]. You help users with...
step4.communicationStylePlaceholder: e.g. Use formal address. Be friendly but professional...

step5.title: Define Specialties
step5.subtitle: Specialized modes for different perspectives. At least one required.
step5.additionalPromptPlaceholder: e.g. Focus on administrative law aspects...

fileUpload.unsupported: Not supported: {name}. Allowed: PDF, TXT, MD, PNG, JPG
fileUpload.visionWarning: Note: Image uploaded, but no Vision Model selected!
fileUpload.autoSwitch: Will automatically switch to {model} when sending.

update.restartNotice: Update installed! The application will now restart...

messageInput.heroPlaceholder: How can I help you today?
messageInput.createInManager: Create one in the Expert Manager.
messageInput.noAudioSupport: Browser does not support audio recording
messageInput.micBlocked: Microphone blocked - please allow in browser settings
messageInput.micDenied: Microphone access denied - reload page and allow
messageInput.micInUse: Microphone is being used by another app

personalInfo.headerDescription: This information will be automatically inserted into generated letters and documents (e.g., cancellations, applications). You only need to save it once.
personalInfo.title: Title (optional)
personalInfo.deleteConfirmMessage: Do you really want to delete all personal data?

sampling.resetTooltip: Reset all parameters to default values
sampling.autoTooltip: Detect optimal parameters based on model
sampling.customSystemPromptPlaceholder: Optional custom system prompt (overrides default prompt)

messageBubble.documentSaved: The document has been saved locally.
messageBubble.documentGenerating: The document is being generated and saved locally.
messageBubble.ttsFailed: Speech output failed: No audio data

customModel.title: Create Custom Model
customModel.baseModelHint: The model your custom model is based on
customModel.systemPromptPlaceholder: e.g. 'You are Nova, a helpful German AI assistant...'
customModel.systemPromptHint: Defines the personality and behavior of the model.
customModel.temperatureHint: Higher = more creative, lower = more focused (Default: 0.8)
customModel.contextLengthHint: Size of context window. More context = more VRAM.

expertMode.modeNamePlaceholder: e.g. Administrative Law, Social Law, Criminal Law
expertMode.modePromptHint: Appended to the expert's base prompt when this mode is active.
expertMode.keywordsHint: If a keyword appears in the request, this mode is automatically selected.

mateDetail.noDataAvailable: No hardware data available. Start the mate to see data.
mateDetail.phase1Desc: Fleet Mate is transferring log data in chunks...
mateDetail.phase2Desc: AI is analyzing log with GPU acceleration...
mateDetail.aiConfigDesc: Configure the LLM model and system prompt for this mate.
mateDetail.selectModeHint: Select a mode to load the appropriate system prompt for the programming language.
mateDetail.selectModelHint: Select a specific model for this mate or use the default model.
mateDetail.systemPromptPlaceholder: Optional: Custom system prompt for this mate...
mateDetail.systemPromptHint: Define a custom system prompt for this mate. Leave empty for the default prompt.
mateDetail.coderHint: For code assistants like FleetCoder, we recommend a larger model (e.g. qwen2.5-coder:14b). Smaller models are suitable for simple tasks like email classification.

providerSettings.title: llama-server
providerSettings.subtitle: Embedded LLM Server for Fleet Navigator
providerSettings.fleetCodeDesc: FleetCode uses llama-server on port {port}. The server is managed by Fleet Navigator and can be started here.
providerSettings.gpuLayersHint: 0 = CPU only, 99 = all layers on GPU
providerSettings.noModelsWarning: No models found! Please download GGUF models.
providerSettings.serverRunning: Server running! FleetCode and chat are now available.
